item.title: Worth of the Improbable
item.description: Information is inversely proportional to the probability. Have been fascinated at the sheer beauty of the improbable events. They become the stories people love because there is information in it, there is life.

item.title: Testing drafts
item.description: A place to test most features of the blog without messing with the actual site.

item.title: My first post
item.description: Have been thinking to blog for quite a long time, I hope this attempt won't go futile. It seems recently, I have been wishing quite a lot that I had a blog to share my thoughts.
